name: Nexus Treasury Platform
description: The Nexus Treasury Platform provides a stable, secure, and scalable financial operating system for enterprises. It specializes in unified business financial dashboards, treasury automation, and AI-powered transaction intelligence. Designed adhering to best practices in enterprise security, compliance (SOC 2, ISO 27001), and high availability architecture. This platform replaces the previous experimental prototype with a production-ready MVP focused on real-time financial aggregation and intelligent reporting.
system_architecture: Microservices Architecture (MSA) with Hybrid Cloud Deployment
core_directives: Ensure 99.99% uptime and high availability for critical financial services.
Maintain strict adherence to global regulatory compliance standards (KYC/AML/GDPR).
Implement zero-trust security model and robust API governance.
Prioritize data integrity, confidentiality, and non-repudiation.
Provide real-time telemetry and explainability for all AI-driven recommendations.

security_posture.encryption_standard: AES-256 GCM using HSMs and Key Management Services (KMS)
security_posture.intrusion_detection: Integrated SIEM/WAF/EDR system with automated incident response.

ai_integration_levels.risk_management: Predictive Fraud and Liquidity Risk Engine (PFLR)

initial_deployment_scope: Unified Business Financial Dashboard and Treasury Automation MVP
